org.nzdis.micro.AgentController

  • Packages that use AgentController 
    Package Description
    org.nzdis.micro  

    • Uses of AgentController in org.nzdis.micro

      Methods in org.nzdis.micro that return AgentController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentController Agent.addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter)
      Initialize a message filter role as a new sub-agent in this agent's group.
      AgentController AbstractAgent.addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter)
      Adds message filter (on a dedicated sub micro-agent) to this agent
      AgentController Agent.addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter, java.lang.String messageFilterAgentName)
      Initialize a message filter role as a new sub-agent in this agent's group.
      AgentController AbstractAgent.addMessageFilter(MessageFilter filter, java.lang.String messageFilterAgentName)
      Adds message filter (on a dedicated sub micro-agent) to this agent
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role role)
      Instantiate an Agent for a given Role.
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role aRole)
      Instantiate an Agent for a given Role.
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] roles)
      Instantiates an Agent for given Roles.
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] aRoleArray)
      Variant of newAgent() with array of roles to be instantiated on new agent.
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] aRoleArray, java.lang.String name)
      Instantiates an Agent for given Roles.
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] aRoleArray, java.lang.String name)
      Variant of newAgent() with array of roles to be instantiated on new agent, and option to declare agent name
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] aRoleArray, java.lang.String name, boolean useNameAsPrefix)
      Variant of newAgent() with role array and agent name as further parameter, and option to use the passed agent name parameter as prefix for the actual agent name which is then determined by the platform at runtime.
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] aRoleArray, java.lang.String name, boolean useNameAsPrefix, java.lang.String cljScript)
      Instantiates an agent for the given roles on SystemOwner level.
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] aRoleArray, java.lang.String name, boolean useNameAsPrefix, java.lang.String cljScript)
      Variant of newAgent() with role array to be instantiated on new agent with specified agent name.
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role[] aRoleArray, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String cljScript)
      Instantiates an agent for the given roles on SystemOwner level.
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role role, java.lang.String name)
      Variant for newAgent() with option to provide agent name.
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role aRole, java.lang.String name)
      Variant of newAgent() with customized name for agent.
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role role, java.lang.String name, boolean useNameAsPrefix)
      Variant of newAgent() with played role, agent name and option to use passed name only as prefix for actual agent name (suffix determined by platform).
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role aRole, java.lang.String name, boolean useNameAsPrefix)
      Variant of newAgent() with agent name as further parameter, and option to use the passed agent name parameter as prefix for the actual agent name which is then determined by the platform at runtime.
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role role, java.lang.String name, boolean useNameAsPrefix, java.lang.String cljScript)
      Variant of newAgent() with played role, agent name and option to use passed name only as prefix for actual agent name (suffix determined by platform).
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role aRole, java.lang.String name, boolean useNameAsPrefix, java.lang.String cljScript)
      Variant of newAgent() with role to be instantiated, agent name, indicator if agent name is only to be used as prefix (rest of name determined by platform) and a Clojure script holding the agent implementation
      static AgentController SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Role role, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String cljScript)
      Variant of newAgent() with played role and agent name.
      AgentController AgentLoader.newAgent(Role aRole, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String cljScript)
      Variant of newAgent() with agent name as further parameter and optional Clojure script for agent implementation
